mapper.select: select count(id) from unit where building_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sharding_id = #{sharding_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT elevator,elevator_num from unit where building_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sharding_id = #{sharding_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY create_time,update_time limit 1
